# hyper-openssl
[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/sfackler/hyper-openssl.svg?style=shield)](https://circleci.com/gh/sfackler/hyper-openssl)

[Documentation](https://docs.rs/hyper-openssl)

Hyper SSL support via rust-openssl.
